Description: Glazed composition (faience) naked female figurine brokwn from an unguent spoon; originally with arms outstretched; blue skin, black hair; legs, arms and headdress lost.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: J A R Munro
Bibliographic references: Munro and Tubbs 1891 / Excavations in Cyprus, 1890. Third season's work. Salamis (p. 164 and fig. 12)
